proposal: Diving into the world of Quark, where transparency and immutability reign supreme across Ethereum and Alveychain. 🌐 With 29 holders on the ETH network, you're shaping a unique ecosystem. Why not amplify this vision with our suite of B2B tools? From launching your own DEX to engaging the community with a blockchain lottery, we're here to fuel your journey. Let's make Quark not just a token, but a thriving community cornerstone.
